titleStmt.title: A letter apologeticall of George Brisse Lord of Desgrutieres wherein are set downe the reasons that moued him to turne to the reformed. / Written to Monsieur Touraine, Aduocate in the Court of Parliament of Bretany. A worke very profitable for those to reade that desire to know the grounds of their religion. Translated out of French.
Lettre apologétique de George Brisset, Sr Desgrustières. English.
titleStmt.author: Brisset, Georges.
Tauraine, Monsieur.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by G. Eld for Richard Lea, and are to be sold at his shop at the North entry of the Royall Exchange,

notesStmt.note: A translation of Georges Brisset: Lettre apologétique de George Brisset, Sr Desgrustières, sur les raisons qui l'ont meu à se ranger à la religion réformée.
Another translation of the French original exists under the title: The apologie of George Brisset, Lord of Gratence (STC 3791).
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
